column1: Kata Robata////I wanted badly to write a positive review for Kata Robata. I've dined in on a few occasions and usually only have good things to say about the fish; most of the other small plates or hot dishes are also quite good. My Sunday dinner
column3: was drastically different. My party of 4 ordered two sets of the DIY handroll takeout kits
column4: each of which comes with 10 sheets of nori
column14: and salmon). For only ~60$ for a two-person kit
column15: it definitely isn't a bad deal
column16: as the amount of fish is pretty generous for that price point (though I wish they provided a little more rice).
